mapper.select: SELECT ft_price.id, ft_price.askprice, ft_price.bidprice, ft_price.pricetimestamp, ft_price.instrumentid, ins.externalid, ins.categoryid, ins.instrumentdescription, ins.maxquantity, ins.minquantity FROM ( SELECT instrumentid, max(pricetimestamp) time from ft_price group by instrumentid ) sub, ft_price JOIN ft_instrument ins on ins.id = ft_price.instrumentid WHERE sub.instrumentid = ft_price.instrumentid and sub.time = ft_price.pricetimestamp
